titles: In mortem serenissimæ principis Mariæ ad regem elegia
author: Vliet, Jan Joris van der, b. ca. 1610.
notes: The Roman numeral date is made using turned C's.
Latin verse - "Hei mihi! quuis trepidas scralis nuncius aures,".
Reproduction of the originals in Chetham's Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
keywords: Mary, --  Princess Royal of England, 1631-1660 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
